version_name: 1.22- feature addition: Remodel of the text detail screen. Major overhaul of send/receive SMS screens with more compact view space - bug fix: Requires user to log in while not necessary- bug fix: After phone number is recycled

version_description:
- Revamped incoming & missed calls, new text & MMS and voicemail notifications to be more efficient.
- Improved overall call answering experience in-app & on lock screen.
- Show stored contact instead of phone # on lock screen for missed call, new text, MMS and voicemail.
- New custom ringtones for incoming & missed call, new text & MMS and voicemail notifications in Account Settings -> Sounds & Ringtones
- Ability to decline incoming call & stop ring from lock screen
- Fixed: Random crash when adding new contact from SMS
- Eliminated network connection & activities after backgrounding app . Save bandwidth & battery on your phone.
- Added Pinch to Zoom/Minimize support for viewing large MMS images
- Fixed: Cannot hear newly recorded voicemail greeting.
- Fixed: Occasional SSL error during texting

- Fixed: iPhone 4S issue - Cannot initiate first text message occasionally
- Fixed: iPhone 4S issue - Problem selecting or accessing certain contacts in Contacts tab
- Added: Support for custom, system text tones & some new ringtones. Account Settings - Sounds & Ringtones
- Fixed: Form factor bugs affecting iPads running iOS 9
- Fixed: MMS images not pinch-to-zoomable when image sources are captured screenshots from the phone
- Removed live os battery probes & optimized registration while app is in use for energy efficiency reasons
- Fixed: Not receiving push notification on devices running minor iterations of iOS 8 and 9
- Fixed: When there's unheard voicemail, new voicemail notifier gets stuck each time you relaunch the app
- Added: In-app number porting support for refreshing new profile
- Fixed: Account details not showing when switching from disconnected network to connected

- Added support for UK account
- Added support for UK phone numbers
- Fixed: Pictures sent through MMS are being received distorted

- Fixed: Crash when receiving a combination of MMS & text on 64-bit devices
- Fixed: Blank text thread after responding to incoming text notification
- Fixed: Most recent text not showing after text thread opens in response to incoming text notification
- Added in-app instruction for SIM card users to make an OTT account in order make calls or send text

- Added app support for Spain market
- Added camera support for picture IDs
- Fixed: iPhone 4 running iOS 7 cannot complete Spain ID verification issue
- Fixed: Cannot find the countries in the contacts tab due to country translation issue
- Fixed: Group msg push single thread, group thread issue
- Fixed: New sms not updating quickly in message screen
- Fixed: Settings screen causes UI glitch after responding to incoming call notification
- Fixed: The app notifies of incoming call in app after answering the call when toggling between FP app & other apps
- Fixed: Non E164 phone number bug affecting in-sms number direct-dial

- Removed duplicate legacy silent push on old iPhones
- Added missing Spanish translation
- Enhanced ID check flow
- Support for selecting & ordering new phone number

version_name: 3.0- Added integration with Call Kit for iOS 10 users. Now when you receive a call through FreedomPop

version_description:
Ver 2.6
- Fixed: App prompting notifications reminder on iOS 10 beta even with proper settings
- Fixed: iPad issue when app is launched with device in horizontal position
- Fixed: No missed call notification when caller hangs up without leaving a voicemail

Version 3.0
- Added integration with Call Kit for iOS 10 users. Now when you receive a call through FreedomPop, it appears the same as regular calls on your phone and you can answer from the lock screen without entering your passcode.
- Added general support for iOS 10
- Added support for sending pictures and texts or multiple pictures at once (MMS service required)
- SMS, MMS, Group MMS overhaul
- Enhanced the speed of in-call transition
- Fixed new voicemail notifications
- Fixed login issues related to invalid credentials and verification
- Fixed push alert showing duplicate answer option. (Affected alerts option in notification settings)
- Crushed some minor bugs

- Fixed: Delay in connecting call after accepting call on lock screen
- Fixed: New text occasionally not getting updated when connected to 3G cellular
- Fixed: Deleted picture from public photo gallery issue
- Fixed: Preview text not showing the latest text
- Improved overall responsiveness of SMS & MMS

We frequently update our app. Please make sure you are on the latest version for the best experience.

You asked, we listened!
- Improved the login screen.
- Added onboarding walkthroughs to guide first-time users
- Fixed a bug affecting legacy iPhones
- Crushed some minor messaging bugs

You can check out our FAQs in the app or by visiting support.freedompop.com

We love to hear your feedback:
e-mail: iosfeedback@freedompop.com
Twitter: @FreedomPopHelp

*** If you're experiencing app crashes on iPhone 4 or 4s devices, please update to this version to resolve the issue***

Features:
- Voicemail Transcriptions (in beta)
- FreedomShop (US Only)
- Support for iOS 10.2
- Ability to refresh account if there are any data connection or calling issues


Fixes:
- A crash affecting iPhone 4s users when launching the app
- Sending pictures, emojis and group texts going as 2 separate messages
- Improved SMS status
- Improved performance and launch time speed
- Improved account creation and onboarding flow
- Other minor bugs and crashes

You can check out our FAQs in the app or by visiting support.freedompop.com

We love to hear your feedback:
e-mail: iosfeedback@freedompop.com
Twitter: @FreedomPopHelp

Fixes & Enhancements:
- Touch tone key presses not recognized when receiving incoming call voice prompt from an automated system
- Brief missed call indicator flashing after navigating to Recent tab
- Removed contact permission requirement for voicemail
- Previously typed msg appears after responding to incoming sms push to view the incoming sms
- Mark new timestamp on sms/mms for new calendar days in a long msg thread
- Random send sms stuck in sending status
- ‘Delete all’ call history broken
- Occasionally unable to clear outgoing call logs
- App issue with device default language Russian or French
- Miscellaneous reported issues from previous release

You can check out our FAQs in the app or by visiting support.freedompop.com

We love to hear your feedback:
e-mail: iosfeedback@freedompop.com
Twitter: @FreedomPopHelp

This is our biggest update yet. This update requires iOS 8.2 and above. We have fully redesigned our app. Here are a few of the things you'll get with this update:

- Full use of CallKit iOS 10 devices
- Ability to customize CallKit ringtones from the app: My Account > Sounds & Ringtones
- Improved VOIP push notification for iOS 8 & 9
- Optimized for different iPhone sizes
- Added a refresh button for voicemails, call logs, and your account
- Ability to listen to voicemails via wired headset, receiver, speaker, Bluetooth
- Improved Bluetooth support
- Enhanced general app performance

Fixed:
- Voicemails not playing when phone is on vibrate/silent
- Voicemail playback echo
- Copy & paste phone numbers from Maps app not working
- Launching app caused Apple music to stop playing
- Minor bugs and crashes


You can check out our FAQs in the app or by visiting support.freedompop.com

We love to hear your feedback:
e-mail: iosfeedback@freedompop.com
Twitter: @FreedomPopHelp

Features:
+ Overhaul of compose message bar
- Made it easier to type out or edit long messages
- Ability to activate return key to jump to next line
- Fixed issue with send message button obscuring drafted message behind it
- "Tap + hold" to Resend sms/mms
- "Tap + hold" to copy & paste sms/mms
- Added: support for attaching images from outside sources as mms
- Added: support for big emoji
+ Added option in Call Settings to block outgoing Premium Voice call for international roamers
+ Mini overhaul of Contacts screen
+ Auto copy phone number to allow users to paste when choosing "Add to Existing Contact" from Recents/Text tabs

Fixes:
- Issue with custom ringtones not being saved after app is closed
- Issue with existing voicemail transcripts missing after upgrading to new version
- Issue with the size of captions in the bottom bar
- Issue with links appear as MMS in preview
- Issue with sending multiple pictures
- Launching app when 3rd party streaming apps like Spotify or Pandora is playing caused music to stop
- Deleted message threads showed up again
- Missing call log icons in Recents tab
- Incoming call duration not showing in logs

We love to hear your feedback
e-mail: iosfeedback@freedompop.com
Twitter: @FreedomPopHelp

Features:
- Support for call handoff between Wifi and LTE/4G/3G on VoIP calls
- Upgraded latest iOS SDK to fully support new Apple file system.
- Speed up re-registration with new network reconnection
- Support for new DTMF signal
- Dialpad support for preserving the last dialed number from any sources (i.e quick call from Recents, Text)
- Support for sharing voicemail (accounts that have voicemail)

Fixed:
- Contact is not recognized on first incoming call bug reported on some iOS 10 devices
- Group MMS bug (US only)
- Bug affecting iOS 8 devices
- Not receiving the first call after force closing app
- Other small bugs and crashes

Features:
- Resolve account issues when your account is not active

Fixed:
- latest texts not showing in some threads
- adding multiple recipients for group messaging from the "To:"
- other minor bugs and performance

If you are on iOS 11, please update to this version to resolve incoming call issues.

Features:
- Ability to block calls/SMS from unwanted numbers. You can block numbers from My Account > Call Settings, Recents and Texts tabs.
- Improved contact search while composing a new message

Fixed:
- Issue with incoming calls on iOS 11
- Small bugs and crashes

New:
- Support for iPhone X
- Support for iOS 11+
- Improved call handover between wifi and cellular for SIM users
- Improved notifications for devices with iOS 10 or higher
- SMS notification banner includes the message body
- Ability to right swipe back to the Text tab from a text thread
- Other performance enhancements

Fixed:
- Issue of not reliably receiving call & text notifications on devices running iOS 11
- Crash affecting iOS 10 devices
- Issue when responding to voicemail notifications caused progress spinner to get stuck
- Issue of getting logged out after powering phone back on and not unlocking phone with passcode
Performance enhancements and bug fixes

Fixed:
- Issue with sending MMS on newer phones
- App crashing on iPhone 4s
- Other crashes and performance issues
- Performance enhancements and bug fixes

- Added: Support for new software update.

- Fixed Call issues and improved overall call experience.
- Fixed bug: After selecting speaker option and playing voicemail for the first time, the voicemail does not play through speaker.
- Fixed bug: After tapping to refresh settings in the My Account tab, the screen sometimes freezes.
